div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RiskAssessment|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `RiskAssessment` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `RiskAssessment`. Element `RiskAssessment` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment`.
Element `RiskAssessment.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.meta`.
Element `RiskAssessment.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.implicitRules`.
Element `RiskAssessment.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.language`.
Element `RiskAssessment.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.text`.
Element `RiskAssessment.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.contained`.
Element `RiskAssessment.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.identifier`.
Element `RiskAssessment.basedOn` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.basedOn`.
Element `RiskAssessment.parent` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.parent`.
Element `RiskAssessment.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.status`.
Element `RiskAssessment.method` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.method`.
Element `RiskAssessment.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.code`.
Element `RiskAssessment.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.subject`.
Element `RiskAssessment.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.encounter`.

Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment`. Element `RiskAssessment.occurrence[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.occurrence[x]`. Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.occurrence[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment`.
Element `RiskAssessment.condition` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.condition`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `RiskAssessment.performer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `RiskAssessment.performer` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.performer`.
Element `RiskAssessment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.reasonCode`. Element `RiskAssessment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.reasonReference`.
Element `RiskAssessment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.reasonCode`. Element `RiskAssessment.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.reasonReference`.
Element `RiskAssessment.basis` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.basis`.
Element `RiskAssessment.prediction` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction`.
Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.outcome` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.outcome`.

Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.prediction.probability[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment.prediction`. Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.probability[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.probability[x]`. Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.prediction.probability[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment.prediction`.
Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.qualitativeRisk` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.qualitativeRisk`.
Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.relativeRisk` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.relativeRisk`.

Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.prediction.when[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment.prediction`. Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.when[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.when[x]`. Note that the target element context `RiskAssessment.prediction.when[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `RiskAssessment.prediction`.
Element `RiskAssessment.prediction.rationale` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.prediction.rationale`.
Element `RiskAssessment.mitigation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.mitigation`.
Element `RiskAssessment.note` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `RiskAssessment.note`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
